short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the time you spend on each website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HI , This is a real time tracker this will track your time spent on every website in HH/MM/SS (i.e Hours minutes secounds). It will track different time for every website not page. This toll will appear in the bottom right corner you just have to add it and it will start doing its work!
